inclusion.criterion: low to intermediate risk of myocardial infarction and/or complications
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: negative cardiac biomarker including creatine kinase-MB, myoglobin, and/or cardiac troponin I at initial testing
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: require admission to the hospital by the EP at the time of risk-stratification
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: able to hold their breath for ≥ 15 seconds
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: heart rate of < 70 beats per minute before or after the administration of beta-blocker medication
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: contraindication to iodinated and/or beta-blocking drugs
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: compromised renal function defined as creatinine ≥ 1.2 mg/dl
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: pregnant, suspected pregnant or other vulnerable populations e.g., incarcerated patients
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: documented CAD by prior invasive coronary angiography or coronary CT angiography and/or patients with coronary artery stents, prior angioplasty, or prior coronary artery bypass grafts (CABG)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: prior cardiac imaging (within the past year) with normal result including invasive coronary angiography, coronary CT angiography, or nuclear stress testing
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. He was recently discharged after a negative work-up for syncope which included the implantation of a cardiac monitoring device.
